# Helvety Auth

> Centralized authentication service for the Helvety ecosystem. Secure sign-in with passkeys and email. Engineered and designed in Switzerland.

## Core Pages
- [Sign In](https://auth.helvety.com): Sign in to your Helvety account

## Helvety Ecosystem
- [Helvety](https://helvety.com): Main Helvety website with company information and legal pages
- [Helvety Store](https://store.helvety.com): Official store for Helvety software products and subscriptions
- [Helvety PDF](https://pdf.helvety.com): Free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit
- [Helvety Contacts](https://contacts.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted contact management
- [Helvety Tasks](https://tasks.helvety.com): End-to-end encrypted task management

## Optional
- [GitHub](https://github.com/CasparRubin/helvety): Public monorepo for all Helvety applications (source-visible, not open source)
